82380.summary: Some customers in Steveston are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82380.title: Aug 23 - Steveston | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

82372.affected_area: Winnipeg (East Elmwood, Kildonan crossing and Peguis)
82372.summary: Some customers in the East Elmwood, Kildonan crossing and Peguis areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82372.title: Aug 23 - Winnipeg (East Elmwood, Kildonan crossing and Peguis) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

82382.summary: Some customers in the Fort Richmond area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. Crews have determined this outage is due to a fibre cut caused by a Third Party Construction. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82382.title: Aug 23 - Winnipeg (Fort Richmond) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
